name: Office Panic
description:
A game about repairing things in a haunted office where everything breaks down all the time.

Contrls: Use the arrow keys to move around and stand still next to broken items to repair them.

Sound effects were created by http://www.superflashbros.net/as3sfxr/

Other sound effects from freesound.org: "Office Ambience.wav" by Dean-Raul_DiArchangeli licensed under CC0 (https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/) (https://freesound.org/people/Dean-Raul_DiArchangeli/sounds/108695/)

Programmer: Tony Ohls Graphics: Dennis Bengs
